title: Seminars
description: Non-commercial, safety-focused seminars delivered worldwide by Esco cell culture specialists.
paragraphs: Esco champions safe and effective cell culture practices in laboratory environments. We understand that maintaining aseptic technique and contamination control is essential to protect personnel and ensure research integrity.

To answer this crucial need, Esco Cell Culture Institute delivers non-commercial, safety-focused seminars worldwide. These sessions can be conveniently hosted on-site at your facility, based on scheduling availability. With our distribution network spanning over 100 countries, an Esco cell culture specialist is always within reach to provide expert guidance.
whoCanAttend: Lab Personnel • Researchers • Teachers and Students
